alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Panola; Quitman (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 31 at 7:40AM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional ice accumulations of two tenths to three tenths of an inch. Light sleet accumulations are possible as well. * WHERE...Coahoma, Quitman and Panola Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
